qas.question: Where did Tito travel in 1977 to reconcile with Chinese leadership?
In what year did Tito travel to China to reconcile with Chinese leadership?
What Chinese leader traveled to Yugoslavia in 1979?
After the constitutional changes made in what year did Tito reduce his role in the day-to-day running of the state.
In what year did Tito travel to the U.S. to visit Washington D.C., amist protest by anti-communist Croat, Serb and Albanian groups?

context: After the constitutional changes of <a3_0>1974<a3_0/>, Tito began reducing his role in the day-to-day running of the state. He continued to travel abroad and receive foreign visitors, going to <a0_0>Beijing<a0_0/> in <a1_0>1977<a1_0/> and reconciling with a Chinese leadership that had once branded him a revisionist. In turn, <a2_0>Chairman Hua Guofeng<a2_0/> visited Yugoslavia in 1979. In <a4_0>1978<a4_0/>, Tito traveled to the U.S. During the visit strict security was imposed in Washington, D.C. owing to protests by anti-communist Croat, Serb and Albanian groups.
